title: trying to reconnect after login
body: well, i have no idea what you guys are doing. the problem exists since 3 or 4 patches and nothing has been done yet. don't even come and blame my connection, because that i'd never have the chance to get in. i used 4 different connections from different providers and the problem occurs on every. i even submitted a ticket with the problem where it was admitted that it is a BUG affecting mostly mac users!. i would be nice if we get a heads up on when we can expect a fix. i can't belive it wasn't fixed after 6 weeks

replies.body: Hi! I have had the same issue for about 2 months now. I am also a mac user. Have tried everything, from the HRT to every single step of the connection issue guide. Nothing seems to work. I have to try logging in 4-5 times with a couple of Laptop-Restarts and Router-Restarts in between to finally be able to play. It is getting really frustrating to the point that  after 15 minutes of attempting to log in I loose patience and don't want to play anymore. From all the other threads I have read, it seems this issue mostly occurs to Mac Users on the EUW server. I can easily log in into the NA servers with my other account every time. The problem seems to be with the EUW server. Can Riot please look into this?

The issue may be more local if different connections are causing the same problem, and for multiple patches.  When you get a chance, download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to really get an analysis of what's blocking you from reaching our servers.  Run a traceroute to 104.160.131.1 for about five minutes.  Let me know your results, but remove the first 2 IP's on the list.
i cant run that on mac, like i said its a mac issue

I haven't heard of anything specific going on with macs, but connection issues are pretty common as League is always online.  Most common league issues for macs, more specifically, tend to be connection related as well.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in this case, our tech team should be able to get some more context and find options best fit for you.

i submited a ticket 6 weeks ago with linking this topic

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Bp9NwPHz-trying-to-reconnect-on-a-mac

the mad clown dealt with it and said its a known bug. the thing is, if it was a connection issue, i wouldn't be able the see the chat working in the backround. i mean, i had a couple of times where everything as grayed out because of lack of connection, but at the point the client fully connects, the window pops up with "trying to reconnect" . i am also able to recieve chat messages while this window tells me i am not connected. so this is really odd. its ok when there is no connection everything turns grey. but this window shouldn't pop up when there is an actually connection

Hey there!  Thanks for the route!  It looks like your router is having a huge issue leaving your network, so it's not making it far at all.  You should run through the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot this.

Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to auto-configure your firewall settings in case that could be a culprit.
